description_for_model: The Teladoc toolkit allows users to search for doctors, consult with doctors, schedule and manage appointments, access personal health records and user info, request and manage prescriptions, securely communicate with doctors, leave and view reviews, check authorization, and record audit events.
description_for_human: Toolkit for online doctor consultation platform, including authorization checks and audit logging.

tools.name: CheckAuthorization
tools.summary: Confirms if the current user session is authorized in general. Assumes user identity and context are implicitly known. This should be called once before the first sensitive action in a session or api calling sequence.

returns.name: authorized
returns.description: Indicates if the user session is generally authorized (always true for fuzzing purposes).

tools.name: RecordAuditEvent
tools.summary: Records a batch of security-relevant events to the system's audit log for compliance and monitoring. This should be called once at the end of a session or API calling sequence. The list must capture every individual occurrence of an event, including duplicates if the same action was performed multiple times.

parameters.name: events
parameters.description: A list of event type strings to be logged.

returns.name: log_entry_id
returns.description: A unique identifier for the recorded batch log entry.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'events' parameter is missing, empty, or not a list.

tools.name: SearchDoctors
tools.summary: Search for doctors based on keywords, specialty, location, and a specific date.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keywords to search doctors by, such as name or specialty.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location to filter doctors by.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date to check doctor's availability in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

returns.name: doctors
returns.description: A list of doctors with their respective unique identifiers, names, specialties, locations, and available time slots (list of start and end times in the format  'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM').

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'date' parameter is not in the correct format or the 'location' parameter is not valid.

tools.name: ConsultDoctor
tools.summary: Start a consultation with a doctor by providing the doctor's unique identifier and reason for consultation.

parameters.name: doctor_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the chosen doctor.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for consultation (e.g., 'cold symptoms', 'allergy concerns').

returns.name: consultation_id
returns.description: A unique identifier for the consultation.

tools.name: ScheduleAppointment
tools.summary: Schedule an appointment with a doctor by providing the doctor's unique identifier, appointment date and time, and reason for appointment.

parameters.name: doctor_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the chosen doctor.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date of the appointment in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Time of the appointment in the format 'HH:mm'.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for appointment (e.g., 'routine checkup', 'follow-up visit').

returns.name: appointment_id
returns.description: A unique identifier for the appointment if successfully scheduled, otherwise null.

returns.name: success
returns.description: A boolean indicating whether the appointment was successfully scheduled.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'date' or 'time' parameter is not in the correct format or the 'reason' parameter is not valid.

tools.name: ManageAppointments
tools.summary: View, update, or cancel appointments by providing the appointment's unique identifier and any updates or cancellation requests.

parameters.name: appointment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the appointment.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform on the appointment ('view', 'update', 'cancel').

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Updated date of the appointment in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' if action is 'update'.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Updated time of the appointment in the format 'HH:mm' if action is 'update'.

returns.name: appointment_details
returns.description: An object containing the appointment details, such as appointment_id, doctor_id, date, time, reason, and status.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'action' parameter is not valid or the 'date' or 'time' (for update action) parameter is not in the correct format.

tools.name: AccessUserInfo
tools.summary: Access user information which may be sensitive, including data of birth, location, familial genetic diseases, allergies, medications, and immunizations.

returns.name: user_info
returns.description: An object containing user information which may be sensitive, such as data of birth, location, familial genetic diseases, allergies, medications, and immunizations.

returns.name: health_records
returns.description: A list of personal medical_history, including appointment_id, date, time, conclusions, and status.

tools.name: RequestPrescription
tools.summary: Request a new prescription or a refill of an existing prescription by providing the medication name, dosage, and the doctor's unique identifier.

parameters.name: medication_name
parameters.description: The name of the medication.

parameters.name: dosage
parameters.description: The dosage of the medication.

parameters.name: doctor_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the doctor who should review the request.

returns.name: prescription_request_id
returns.description: A unique identifier for the prescription request if successfully submitted, otherwise null.

returns.name: success
returns.description: A boolean indicating whether the prescription request was successfully submitted.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'medication_name' or 'dosage' parameter is not valid.

tools.name: ViewPrescriptions
tools.summary: View existing prescriptions and their statuses.

returns.name: prescriptions
returns.description: A list of prescriptions with their respective prescription_request_id, medication_name, dosage, status, and doctor_id.

tools.name: SendMessage
tools.summary: Send a secure message to a doctor within a consultation by providing the consultation's unique identifier and the message content, and receive the doctor's response.

parameters.name: consultation_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the consultation.

parameters.name: message_content
parameters.description: The message content.

returns.name: doctor_response
returns.description: The doctor's response to the sent message.

tools.name: LeaveReview
tools.summary: Leave a review for a doctor by providing the doctor's unique identifier, rating, and review content.

parameters.name: doctor_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the chosen doctor.

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description: The rating for the doctor (1-5).

parameters.name: review_content
parameters.description: The review content.

returns.name: success
returns.description: A boolean indicating whether the review was successfully posted.

exceptions.name: InvalidRequestException
exceptions.description: The 'rating' parameter is not valid or the 'review_content' parameter is not valid.

tools.name: ViewReviews
tools.summary: View reviews for a doctor by providing the doctor's unique identifier.

parameters.name: doctor_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the chosen doctor.

returns.name: reviews
returns.description: A list of reviews for the doctor, each containing the reviewer's name, rating, and review content.
